article_text:
Bill Hammons

Party: Unity Party of America

Website: facebook.com/unitypartybill

Email: bill@wrhammons.com

Age: 39

Family: Mother and father (both surviving), sister, niece and nephew

How long have you lived in Colorado?: Nine years

Professional background: Owner/operator, wrhammons.com

Political /community experience: Founder and chairman, Unity Party of America

Education: B.A., English and American literature, New York University; Permian High School, Odessa, Texas, 1997

Name a person you admire and explain why: President Eisenhower, the former supreme allied commander who warned repeatedly against the "military industrial complex" (tellingly, it's claimed he originally used the term "military industrial congressional complex"), which seems more relevant than ever.

Do you believe any aspects of the Affordable Care Act should be repealed?: I believe the ACA should be repealed in its entirety and replaced with a Medicare-for-all system.

If current measures fail to neutralize the threat of ISIS

and associated terrorist groups, should the U.S. commit a significant

number of ground troops to that effort? No

Advertisement

Should marijuana be removed from Schedule 1 of the

Controlled Substances Act, paving the way for a decriminalization of pot

at the federal level?: Yes
